title: UST 校友手足 救理大

replies.msg:
而家乜都要試，pls sign the petition to call HKUST for helping PolyU
http://chng.it/RPfG6R8pkW

另外
Send to :
ophkust@ust.hk
Alumni@ust.hk
Dear President and alumni office,

I am the alumni of the HKUST community and given the current situation in PolyU, I would like to urge President Wei Shyy and members of the senior administrations to issue the strongest condemnation to Hong Kong Police’s attempted murder to students and other civilians trapped in Hong Kong Polytechnic University, and offer help to those people, in ensuring their safety under the rising threat by Hong Kong Police.

Over the last 24 hours, Hong Kong Police has been using sonic, chemical and lethal weapons to put students in PolyU in danger /death. There are also evidence from Press showing Hong Kong Police is in an attempt to murder/execute a Massacre, by putting first aiders and press under arrest, violating war crimes. Please offer help to those trapped people, our precious youth of HK who have been under zero protections.

Please help.

Best Regards,
An alumni of the HKUST Community
